name: Trailed
description: A full-stack e-commerce app with features like add to cart, user authentication via Firebase.
alt: Trailed - Full-stack e-commerce app with cart features and Firebase authentication

name: SkyTrans
description: A flight cargo transport service with user-friendly design and responsive layout.
alt: SkyTrans - Flight cargo transport service with responsive design

name: Flavoro Piyush
description: An online food delivery platform that lets users browse foods, explore menus, and place orders seamlessly.
alt: Flavoro Piyush – Online food delivery platform for ordering meals easily.

name: Ecommerce Backend
description: A robust eCommerce backend built with Django and SQLite, featuring product management, user authentication, and order handling.
alt: Ecommerce Backend – Django and SQLite-based backend for managing products and orders.

name: Medical Backend
description: A backend medical page for booking doctor appointments and managing patient schedules easily.
alt: A medical backend for booking doctor appointments and managing patient schedules easily.

name: Sky-Update
description: A responsive weather forecast app showing real-time temperature and conditions.
alt: Sky-Update – Weather app displaying real-time forecasts and temperature updates.

name: Job Portal
description: A responsive job portal web app built with Firebase for job listing and data management.
alt: Job Portal – Responsive web app using Firebase for job listings and user management.
